Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Washington/Paulina
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Washington, Damen and Madison: due to, street blockage near Washington/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Washington, Damen and Madison: due to, street blockage near Washington/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Spaulding
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 71st/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 71st/Spaulding.

Headline: Green Line Delays Limited Service
ShortDescription: Green Line service limited service. Shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in one section:

  • between Harlem and Ashland/63rd

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service to Cottage Grove.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
